experience.title: Co-Founder
description: Built an agency from the ground up by optimizing existing relationships, creating new partnerships and leveraging over 10 years of industry knowledge which grew revenue over 60% year over year (pre COVID-19).

experience.title: Experiential Producer
experience.location: Greater Chicago Area, Illinois, United States
description: Hired by agencies and brands to conceptualize and produce experiential marketing campaigns that increased brand awareness among key demographics.
Headed a team of creative freelancers and collaborated with clients to produce three to four projects simultaneously.
Demonstrated professionalism and knowledge by repeatedly being recruited by the same clients.

experience.title: Director of Production
experience.location: Greater Los Angeles Area, California, United States
description: Managed 12 key accounts and a team of over 10 at an experiential marketing agency based in Los Angeles.
Member of the executive team that directly influenced company strategy and overall goals by researching industry standards and practices.
Advocated for updated company benefits to improve employee retention and reduce burnout, leading to retaining producers for over 2 years in a high-turnover industry.
Orchestrated weekly meetings to ensure cross-functional collaboration with creative and business development teams as well as forecasting future revenue and growth.
Represented the executive team onsite at events to oversee the production team and seek out new business opportunities.

experience.title: Account Director
description: Oversaw accounts and directed internal production and creative teams to align with brand teams for Mark Anthony Brands and Teva.
Grew account revenue by building relationships with clients, seeking out new opportunities, and hitting KPIs on projects, leading to increased budgets year over year.
Increased average profit margin on projects by 5%.

experience.title: Senior Producer
experience.location: Greater Los Angeles Area, California, United States
description: Strategized and executed over 30 events for key brands including Red Bull, Nike, and others.
Trained a team of over 5 Assistant Producers and Project Coordinators.
Continuously met and exceeded client expectations and hit all project KPIs, leading to year over year repeat projects, client retention, and account growth.

experience.title: Event Director
description: Planned and executed over 25 domestic and international events within the active entertainment industry.
Developed an event strategy and RFP for local government approvals on future event locations.
Built relationships with key vendors, resulting in over $100K in savings per year.
Spearheaded team to run first P&L and analytics on flagship event to understand overall profit margin.

experience.title: Production Manager
description: Created the on-site logistics and operations plan and led the on-site production team for a successful first year festival.
Researched and vetted key vendors for staging and production leading to a multi-contract agreement.
Established roles and responsibilities for on-site production team.

experience.title: Manager
description: Assisted in discovering new product lines and ordering shipments.
Designed window and in-store displays.
Hosted private in-store parties for clientele.
Styled outfits for magazine shoots.
Built relationships with loyal clients.
